      Methods in model.operator that return Formula 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Formula<?> Or.convert()
      convert: associativity A \/ A = A A \/ ~A = True A \/ True = True 2. distributivity
      Formula<?> Not.convert()
      convert: De Morgan left double-negation left
      Formula<?> Implies.convert()
      converts: contrapos: ~A ==> ~B to A ==> B DISABLED!
      Formula<?> Group.convert() 
      Formula<?> Entails.convert() 
      Formula Biconditional.convert()
      convert: A <==> B to (A ==> B) /\ (B ==> A)
      Formula<?> And.convert()
      convert: associativity A /\ A = A A /\ True = A A /\ False = False A /\ ~A = False 1. distributivity

      static java.util.ArrayList<Valuation> ValuationSet.getValuations(Formula<?> formula)
      create all permuations of valuations
      static boolean ValuationSet.satisfiable(Formula<?> formula)
      Formula is satisfiable if it is true in SOME model
      static boolean ValuationSet.tautology(Formula<?> formula)
      Formula is valid/tautology if it is true in ALL models A is valid if ~A is unsatisfiable
      static boolean ValuationSet.unsatisfiable(Formula<?> formula)
      Formula is satisfiable if it is true in NO model
